'''Columbina''',<ref name="lazzo video description 2" /> also known by her codename "'''Damselette''',"<ref name="lazzo video description 2" /> is the Third of the [[Eleven Fatui Harbingers]].<ref name="childe columbina voiceover">{{Ref/VO|Tartaglia|About Damselette}}</ref>

She makes her first appearance during ''[https://youtu.be/TmaAOV4SJNQ Teyvat Chapter Interlude Teaser: A Winter Night's Lazzo]'' alongside her fellow Harbingers. She can be heard talking to [[Dottore]] at the end, where she tells him he is looking young and asks him about the "Segment in the prime of his life."<ref group="Note">The dialogue in the video, "So, where's the Segment in the prime of his life, then?", matches the dialogue quoted in her [https://twitter.com/Genshin_7/status/1546348811722772480 Japanese VA announcement].</ref>

==Profile==
Despite her harmless appearance, Columbina is implied to be extremely dangerous as [[Tartaglia]] did not want to fight her, having felt something off and advises the [[Traveler]] to be careful around her if they met.<ref name="childe columbina voiceover" />

==Trivia==
* In ''{{w|commedia dell'arte}}'', a type of Italian theater, "Columbina" (Colombina "Little Dove" in Italian), is a female servant who is often the "only functional intellect on the stage" as she does her best to get the Innamorati together.
